input: Channel: web form. Hi, I'm Anna Kowalska. The API returns 500 since yesterday. Please fix ASAP. Contact: anna.k@example.com Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: API returns HTTP 500 since yesterday.

input: Channel: web form. Hello team, the mobile app crashes when I open invoices. I'm Mark. mail is mark77@foo.dev. Not blocking but painful. Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: Mobile app crashes when opening invoices.

input: Channel: web form. Need help with billing. I was charged twice this month. Customer: Ewa Nowak Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: Customer reports double billing this month.

input: Channel: web form. API latency jumped to 8s for all endpoints. This is critical for launch in 2 hours. - Szymon <sz@example.org> Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: API latency increased to 8 seconds across endpoints.

input: Channel: web form. Not sure where to file this: receipts download works sometimes, sometimes not, maybe billing maybe app. Please advise. Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: Intermittent receipt download issue with unclear subsystem ownership.
actions_requested: Triage ownership between app and billing teams

input: Channel: web form. My email is bad format maybe john at corp dot com but I can be reached in portal. Need API key reset. Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: Customer requests API key reset.

input: Channel: web form. ASAP but not urgent: app login page takes a few extra seconds. Name: Ida Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: App login page is slower than expected.

input: Channel: web form. Please cancel invoice INV-883 and update VAT number. This is billing. Contact m.piotr@biz.pl Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: Customer requests invoice cancellation and VAT update.

input: Channel: web form. I pasted logs below. Also I have a legal request and security incident maybe. Can't share details here. Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: Customer mentions potential legal and security incident without details.

input: Channel: web form. Hey, API token rotation doc is outdated and SDK examples fail. low priority. Please keep my wording as-is.

expected.issue_summary: API token rotation documentation is outdated and SDK examples fail.
